name: sun-flute
effect: Evolves Nebby into Solgaleo when used at the Altar of the Sunne.
short_effect: Evolves Nebby into Solgaleo when used at the Altar of the Sunne.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
It is said that the tones it produces were offered
up as an expression of gratitude to the Legendary
Pokémon of the sun.
